title: 20w16atest的替代指令是什么？
author: 奇怪的方块
txt_content: 20w16a中记分板指令里没有test（检测），有没有替代的指令。（testfor也是）

replies.author: Chelover_C60
replies.txt_content:
execute if ...系列
scoreboard players test → execute if score
testfor → execute if entity

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content: /execute if score @s 计分项 matches 1..10 run say 1 到 10 之间

replies.author: 奇怪的方块
replies.txt_content: 啊！这………同时同样的答案怎么给啊………

replies.author: 奇怪的方块
replies.txt_content:
